pricer.utils¶

This file contains shorter utilities to write/save raw files, and change data formats

Module Contents¶

Functions¶

get_seconds_played(time_played: str)

Converts a string representation of time played to seconds

generate_new_pricer_file()

Generates a blank pricer file of items of interest. This is used to fill in the latest pricing

Reads the raw scandata dict dump and converts to usable dataframe

Reads the beancounter database and produces codes per item dict

pricer.utils.logger¶
pricer.utils.get_seconds_played(time_played: str) → int¶

Converts a string representation of time played to seconds

pricer.utils.generate_new_pricer_file()¶

Generates a blank pricer file of items of interest. This is used to fill in the latest pricing information from booty bay gazette. This is done in game using a self build addon with the /pricer command

pricer.utils.source_merge(a, b, path=None)¶

merges b into a

Reads the beancounter database and produces codes per item dict

Write python dict as lua object

pricer.utils.dump_lua(data)¶

Borrowed code to write python dict as lua format(ish)

pricer.utils.read_multiple_parquet(loc)¶

Given a directory path, scan for parquet files, Load and concatenate, returning the full dataframe
